title: Stansberry Investor Hour Interview
itunes:title: Stansberry Investor Hour Interview
description:
In this podcast with Dan Ferris at Stansberry Investor Hour, Vitaliy and Dan have an informative conversation about his new book, Soul in the Game, how the pandemic impacted the macro economy, how to create a mental model to deal with inflation, Vitaliy's writing process, and the difference between an art and a craft.

Enjoy!

You can listen to the original interview here: https://investorhour.com/episodes/from-buffett-to-beethoven-forging-your-own-path
